FHIR R4 Core Prototype Implementation Guide - December 2019. Based on FHIR Version 4.0.1
Note: this is an initial prototype specification.

Example: Condition-UKCore-Condition-Example

  • Narrative
  • XML
  • JSON
{
  "resourceType" : "Condition",
  "id" : "UKCore-Condition-Example",
  "meta" : {
    "profile" : [
      "https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/StructureDefinition/UKCore-Condition"
    ]
  },
  "text" : {
    "status" : "generated",
    "div" : "<div xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"><p><b>Generated Narrative with Details</b></p><p><b>id</b>: UKCore-Condition-Example</p><p><b>meta</b>: </p><p><b>clinicalStatus</b>: Active <span style=\"background: LightGoldenRodYellow\">(Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/condition-clinical code 'active' = 'Active', given as 'Active'})</span></p><p><b>subject</b>: <a href=\"UKCore-Patient-Example.html\">Generated Summary: id: UKCore-Patient-Example; 9912003888; Richard SMITH (OFFICIAL); ph: 01131231234; gender: male; birthDate: 1970-09-11</a></p></div>"
  },
  "clinicalStatus" : {
    "coding" : [
      {
        "system" : "http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/condition-clinical",
        "code" : "active",
        "display" : "Active"
      }
    ]
  },
  "subject" : {
    "reference" : "Patient/UKCore-Patient-Example"
  }
}

Published by NHS Digital nhsdigital.fhir.r4.core.prototype# based on FHIR 4.0.1 created 2019-12-12.
